title: Renewed Framework Contract for Voith Industrial Services with Toyota USA in Alabama, Indiana and West Virginia
text:
Voith Industrial Services
- Successful cooperation in the USA for 15 years
STUTTGART, Germany , Sept. In the USA , Toyota partners with Voith Industrial Services Inc. at several sites. Recently, the industrial services provider has renewed its framework contracts with the car manufacturer in Indiana , Alabama and West Virginia .
At the Toyota plant in Indiana , the contract comprises infrastructural facility management, maintenance, repairs as well as technical cleaning activities. At the Toyota plant in Alabama and West Virginia , the emphasis is on maintenance and technical cleaning services. With tailor-made solutions, the experienced industrial services provider creates an ideal work environment at both plants, allowing the car manufacturer to concentrate on its core business while realizing cost advantages.
"We are proud to continue providing services to Toyota in Alabama , Indiana and West Virginia . The cooperation is characterized by great mutual trust, appreciation and true partnership. To us, this is the key to success," says David Rohde , General Manager at Voith Industrial Services in the USA.
The Toyota Alabama and West Virginia engine plants produce car and truck engines and transmissions. The Toyota Manufacturing plant in Indiana is located in Gibson County . Today, the Toyota Sequoia, Toyota Sienna, Toyota Highlander and Toyota Highlander Hybrid vehicles are produced there.
About Voith Industrial Services:
Voith Industrial Services, a Group Division of Voith GmbH, is one of the leading providers of technical services for key industries such as automotive, energy, chemicals and petrochemicals and of engineering services. In 2013/2014, the company generated with its 18,500 employees sales of €1.18 billion at its more than 170 locations worldwide.
About Voith:
Voith sets standards in the energy, oil & gas, paper, raw materials and transport & automotive markets. Founded in 1867, Voith has nearly 39,000 employees today and generates €5.3 billion in sales. It has locations in around 50 countries worldwide and is one of the large family-owned companies in Europe .
